short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly receive news about the topic of the website you are browsing on!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It was never so easy to learn more about topics of your interest! Simply click on the InstantHeadlines icon (top-right in your browser) and instantly receive news about the topic of the website you are browsing on. 

** This version of InstantHeadlines is a beta version. We are still working to improve the functionality of this extension. Notes and remarks are welcome!
